title: Chapter 1469
body:
Chapter 1469

1469 Meeting

“Brat, kneel down now and slap yourself two hundred times, and I’ll let you die in one piece!”

Jin Yu stared at Lu Ming with a haughty look.

...

what a joke. Nianqing and I are already a couple. We’ve been together for so many years. What nonsense are you talking about? ”

Lu Ming said coldly.

In the face of such a question, how could Lu Ming avoid it?

He could tell that these young men had a different opinion of Xie nianqing. Therefore, he would not avoid them. He wanted everyone to know that Xie nianqing was his girlfriend.

“Kill!”

Jin Yu shouted and pressed his palm down.

BOOM!

A huge demonic palm print pressed down on Lu Ming with shocking power.

Back then, the Feng clan master was also at the peak of the LV 4 martial Royal realm, but his power was much weaker than Jin Yu’s.

This person was obviously a heaven’s favorite.

“Break!”

Lu Ming muttered and thrust the long spear in his hand.

[ thirteen charged strikes ]!

Whoosh!

A spear light pierced through the air and stabbed the demonic palm print.

The four forces at the tip of the spear suddenly burst out with amazing penetrating power. It pierced through the demonic palm print, turning it into demonic Qi and dissipating.

you’re only at the second level of the martial Royal realm. You have some strength, but you still have to die!

Jin Yu’s eyes were cold as his aura became stronger and stronger. Demonic Qi started to burn like flames.

“Stop!”

At this moment, a crisp sound was heard.

Jin Yu was stunned. He turned around and his expression changed. He bowed and said, ” “Jin Yu greets the Holy maiden!”

“This subordinate pays his respects to the Holy maiden!”

The two young men from before also bowed.

“Holy maiden?”

Lu Ming cast his gaze over.

A woman stepped through the air.

She was wearing a long black robe, had a graceful figure, and fair skin. She was very beautiful.

However, it wasn’t Xie nianqing. It was an unfamiliar woman.

It was obvious that there was more than one saintess in the Tianyu demonic sect.

It was normal. Many sects had titles such as Holy maiden, Holy Son, and zongzi. These people were the most talented geniuses of a sect and had the potential to inherit the position of sect leader in the future. However, there would usually be more than one person.

Some sects had two, three, or even more.

Each of them was extremely talented and competed with each other. The strongest person would inherit the position of sect master.

The woman stepped in the air and came to Lu Ming.”What’s going on?”

Holy Virgin Liu Yu, there’s a lecherous man here who claims to be Holy Virgin nianqing’s boyfriend. I’m going to kill him!

Jin Yu said respectfully.

Although his cultivation was not bad, he was still very respectful and fearful in front of Liu Yu.

“Nianqing’s boyfriend? Interesting!”

Liu Yu’s eyes flickered and the corners of her mouth curled into an inexplicable smile. She looked at Lu Ming and said,”Are you really nianqing’s boyfriend?”

that’s right. Whether it’s true or not, you’ll know once you see nianqing!

Lu Ming said.

alright, I’ll believe you this time. But you have to know that if you lie, the Tian Yu demon sect will be your burial ground!

Liu Yu’s eyes revealed a hint of killing intent.

I’m just a mere second level Martial Emperor. How could I have such courage? ”

Lu Ming smiled faintly.

“Alright, I’ll take you to nianqing!”

Liu Yu said.

“Holy maiden …”

Jin Yu’s expression changed.

“Shut up. Do you have any objections to my decision?”

Liu Yu coldly glanced at Jin Yu, causing him to break out in a cold sweat. He quickly lowered his head and did not dare to speak.

“Let’s go!”

Liu Yu took light steps and stepped into the air as she headed toward the depths of the Tian Yu demon sect. Lu Ming followed behind her.

Along the way, some people looked at Lu Ming in surprise. However, when they saw that the person leading the way was Liu Yu, no one said anything.

After crossing one demon mountain after another, the demonic Qi in front of them was getting thicker and thicker.

Very quickly, they arrived at an incomparably huge demonic mountain and landed in front of a huge Palace.

“This place is nianqing’s residence!”

Liu Yu said.

Lu Ming’s eyes were filled with anticipation.

He had not seen Xie nianqing for more than half a year.

He wondered how she was doing after they parted ways in the divine Ruins continent.

“Holy Virgin Liu Yu, may I know why you’ve come?”

A middle-aged woman appeared in front of Liu Yu and bowed slightly.

“Please pass on a message that an old friend is here to see nianqing!”

Liu Yu said in a tender voice.

“An old friend?”

“Is this the person?” the middle-aged woman looked at Lu Ming.

that’s right. This is young master Lu Ming. He said that he is nianqing’s boyfriend!

Liu Yu said with a smile.

“The saint’s boyfriend?”

The middle-aged woman’s expression changed. a mere second level martial Royal realm, Holy maiden Liu Yu. Did you make a mistake? ”

this is the Tian Yu demon sect. I don’t think he would dare to lie. Whether it’s right or wrong, just let nianqing come out and see!

Liu Yu said.

The middle-aged woman’s eyes flickered. She pondered for a moment and said,”Alright, I’ll inform the Saint!”

After saying that, the middle-aged woman turned around and walked into the palace.

After a while, a figure flashed out of the hall and appeared in front of Lu Ming.

“Lu Ming, is it really you?”

A surprised voice was heard.

An alluring figure stood in front of Lu Ming and looked at him carefully.

“Nianqing!”

Lu Ming revealed a smile on his face.

After more than half a year, he finally saw Xie nianqing in the yuan continent.

After more than half a year, Xie nianqing was still as beautiful as ever. In fact, the demonic glow on his body was even more intense. He looked like he had a unique charm that could make one’s heart beat faster with just one look.

Although Liu Yu was equally beautiful, when she stood next to Xie nianqing, she couldn’t hold a candle to him. The distance between them widened, and everyone’s eyes naturally shifted from Liu Yu to Xie nianqing.

Liu Yu’s eyes flashed with jealousy, but she still smiled. Junior Sister nianqing, this man said he’s your boyfriend. It seems he’s not lying!

“Not bad!”

Xie nianqing nodded.

“Hehehe, then I must congratulate Junior Sister nianqing. But Senior Sister is a little strange. Your boyfriend’s cultivation is too low. He’s only at the second level of the Martial Emperor realm …”

At this point, Liu Yu stopped. There was a hint of mockery in her tone.

“In my heart, Lu Ming’s talent is much stronger than yours. It won’t be long before he surpasses you. Alright, Senior Sister, please leave!”

Xie nianqing’s voice was cold, as if he was on bad terms with Liu Yu.

“Hehehe, Junior Sister, I’ll take my leave first.”

Liu Yu smiled and left.

“Lu Ming, come with me!”

Xie nianqing pulled Lu Ming’s hand and entered the hall.

Behind the hall, there was an elegant courtyard. Xie nianqing leaned on Lu Ming’s shoulder. Lu Ming wrapped his arm around Xie nianqing’s waist and kissed his red lips.

The scene was filled with warmth!

After a long time, their lips separated!

The two of them snuggled up to each other and told each other their hearts.

“Little Qing, how did you become the Saint of the Tian Yu demon sect?”

Lu Ming asked curiously.
